processing.text:
declare @q nvarchar(4000), @key nvarchar(4000), @field varchar(32), @baseCurrency varchar(32), @datetime0 datetime declare @user int, @admin bit, @language char(1), @sys varchar(32), @joinUnit bit, @joinDept bit, @r int, @count int select @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID, @language = @@language, @sys = '@@sysDatabaseName', @datetime0 = getdate(), @key = '', @joinUnit = 0, @joinDept = 0 select @baseCurrency = rtrim(val) from options where rtrim(name) = 'm_ma_nt0'
-- Check &Checking;
&EndErrorMode;
-- Key if @admin = 0 begin exec AI_ERP$HRM$DeptRightFilter @user, @admin, 'e', 'e', @sys, @key output, @joinUnit output, @joinDept output select @key = dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$GetCheckKey(@key) select @key = case when @key = '' then '' else ' where (' + @key + ')' end end
-- Gather create table #r(stt_rec char(13), ma_pc char(32), ty_le numeric(19, 4), tien numeric(19, 4), ngay_hl_tu smalldatetime, ngay_hl_den smalldatetime)
select @q = 'insert into #r select e.stt_rec, a.ma_pc, a.ty_le, a.tien, a.ngay_hl_tu, a.ngay_hl_den' select @q = @q + ' from @@table a join hrnv e on a.ma_nv = e.ma_nv' + @key exec sp_executesql @q
select stt_rec, cast('' as char(3)) as stt_rec0, ma_pc, ty_le, tien, ngay_hl_tu, ngay_hl_den, cast(0 as int) as stt into #pc from #r where ma_pc <> '' and ngay_hl_tu is not null
if @type = '0' begin delete #r from #r a where exists(select 1 from hrttluong b where a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec) delete #pc from #pc a where exists(select 1 from hrttctpc b where a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ma_pc = b.ma_pc and a.ngay_hl_tu = b.ngay_hl_tu) end
select b.stt_rec into #k from #r a join hrttluong b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec delete #r from #r a where exists(select 1 from #k b where a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec)
select b.stt_rec, b.stt_rec0, a.ma_pc, a.ty_le, a.tien, a.ngay_hl_tu, a.ngay_hl_den into #pc2 from #pc a join hrttctpc b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ma_pc = b.ma_pc and a.ngay_hl_tu = b.ngay_hl_tu delete #pc from #pc a where exists(select 1 from #pc2 b where a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ma_pc = b.ma_pc and a.ngay_hl_tu = b.ngay_hl_tu) if @type = '1' &ListWhenBeforeImportUpdateLog; -- Insert @@inserting(salary);
select @count = count(*) from #pc if @count > 0 begin create table #sttpc(stt_rec char(13), stt_rec0 char(3)) create table #o1pc(stt_rec char(13), ma_pc varchar(32), ngay_hl_tu smalldatetime, stt int not null identity (1, 1))
insert into #sttpc select b.stt_rec, max(b.stt_rec0) from #pc a join hrttctpc b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec group by b.stt_rec
insert into #o1pc(stt_rec, ma_pc, ngay_hl_tu) select stt_rec, ma_pc, ngay_hl_tu from (select stt_rec, ma_pc, ngay_hl_tu from #pc union select distinct stt_rec, null, null from #pc) a order by stt_rec, ma_pc, ngay_hl_tu
select stt, stt_rec into #o2pc from #o1pc where ma_pc is null and ngay_hl_tu is null
update #pc set stt = b.stt + cast(isnull(c.stt_rec0, 0) as int) from #pc a left join (select c.stt - d.stt as stt, c.stt_rec, c.ma_pc, c.ngay_hl_tu from #o1pc c join #o2pc d on c.stt_rec = d.stt_rec) b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ma_pc = b.ma_pc and a.ngay_hl_tu = b.ngay_hl_tu left join #sttpc c on a.stt_rec = c.stt_rec
-- Insert @@inserting(allowance); end
-- Update if @type = '1' begin update hrttluong set @@list(salary); from hrttluong a join #k b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec update hrttctpc set @@list(allowance); from hrttctpc a join #pc2 b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.stt_rec0 = b.stt_rec0 end
